name: Sulas Glāze
description:
Premise

Mongus is searching for juice.

Mongus's fridge is completely empty. He has no juice! Features
  • Has 3 levels, 2 enemy types and over 5 collectible item types.
  • State of the art Gouraud shaded 3D graphics.
  • Innovative keyboard-only design -- the game can be played with only one hand, you can use other hand to eat sandwich.
  • Additional segmentation faults included, free of charge.
Controls
  • WASD - movement
  • Space - jump
  • F1 - exit
  • F9 - free camera
System requirements
  • OpenGL 4.0 capable graphics card driver
  • 64 bit windows (or LINUX if compiling from source)
  • 512MB RAM
  • 50MB hard drive space
  • Keyboard (mouse will not be needed)
